amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 118-578 to reduce funding for the Office of the Attending Physician to the Congress to FY20 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Office of the Attending Physician to fiscal year 2020 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 289 (Roll no. 350).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 289 (Roll no. 350).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
